verses.t: Woe{H1945} be unto the pastors{H7462} that destroy{H6} and scatter{H6327} the sheep{H6629} of my pasture{H4830}! saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

Therefore thus saith{H559} Lordthe {H3068} God{H430} of Israel{H3478} against the pastors{H7462} that feed{H7462} my people{H5971}; Ye have scattered{H6327} my flock{H6629}, and driven them away{H5080}, and have not visited{H6485} them: behold, I will visit{H6485} upon you the evil{H7455} of your doings{H4611}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

And I will gather{H6908} the remnant{H7611} of my flock{H6629} out of all countries{H776} whither I have driven{H5080} them, and will bring them again{H7725} to their folds{H5116}; and they shall be fruitful{H6509} and increase{H7235}.

And I will set up{H6965} shepherds{H7462} over them which shall feed{H7462} them: and they shall fear{H3372} no more, nor be dismayed{H2865}, neither shall they be lacking{H6485}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

Behold, the days{H3117} come{H935}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}, that I will raise{H6965} unto David{H1732} a righteous{H6662} Branch{H6780}, and a King{H4428} shall reign{H4427} and prosper{H7919}, and shall execute{H6213} judgment{H4941} and justice{H6666} in the earth{H776}.

In his days{H3117} Judah{H3063} shall be saved{H3467}, and Israel{H3478} shall dwell{H7931} safely{H983}: and this is his name{H8034} whereby he shall be called{H7121}, Lord OUR RIGHTEOUSNESSTHE {H3072}.THE Lord…: Heb. Jehovah–tsidkenu

Therefore, behold, the days{H3117} come{H935}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}, that they shall no more say{H559}, LordThe {H3068} liveth{H2416}, which brought up{H5927} the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478} out of the land{H776} of Egypt{H4714};

LordBut, The {H3068} liveth{H2416}, which brought up{H5927} and which led{H935} the seed{H2233} of the house{H1004} of Israel{H3478} out of the north{H6828} country{H776}, and from all countries{H776} whither I had driven{H5080}them; and they shall dwell{H3427} in their own land{H127}.

Mine heart{H3820} within{H7130} me is broken{H7665} because of the prophets{H5030}; all my bones{H6106} shake{H7363}; I am like a drunken{H7910} man{H376}, and like a man{H1397} whom wine{H3196} hath overcome{H5674}, because{H6440} Lordof the {H3068}, and because of the words{H1697} of his holiness{H6944}.

For the land{H776} is full{H4390} of adulterers{H5003}; for because{H6440} of swearing{H423} the land{H776} mourneth{H56}; the pleasant places{H4999} of the wilderness{H4057} are dried up{H3001}, and their course{H4794} is evil{H7451}, and their force{H1369} is not right.swearing: or, cursingcourse: or, violence
For both prophet{H5030} and priest{H3548} are profane{H2610}; yea, in my house{H1004} have I found{H4672} their wickedness{H7451}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

Wherefore their way{H1870} shall be unto them as slippery{H2519} ways in the darkness{H653}: they shall be driven on{H1760}, and fall{H5307} therein: for I will bring{H935} evil{H7451} upon them, even the year{H8141} of their visitation{H6486}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

And I have seen{H7200} folly{H8604} in the prophets{H5030} of Samaria{H8111}; they prophesied{H5012} in Baal{H1168}, and caused my people{H5971} Israel{H3478} to err{H8582}.folly: or, an absurd thing: Heb. unsavoury

I have seen{H7200} also in the prophets{H5030} of Jerusalem{H3389} an horrible thing{H8186}: they commit adultery{H5003}, and walk{H1980} in lies{H8267}: they strengthen{H2388} also the hands{H3027} of evildoers{H7489}, that none{H376} doth return{H7725} from his wickedness{H7451}: they are all of them unto me as Sodom{H5467}, and the inhabitants{H3427} thereof as Gomorrah{H6017}.an…: or, filthiness

Therefore thus saith{H559} Lordthe {H3068} of hosts{H6635} concerning the prophets{H5030}; Behold, I will feed{H398} them with wormwood{H3939}, and make them drink{H8248} the water{H4325} of gall{H7219}: for from the prophets{H5030} of Jerusalem{H3389} is profaneness{H2613} gone forth{H3318} into all the land{H776}.profaneness: or, hypocrisy

Thus saith{H559} Lordthe {H3068} of hosts{H6635}, Hearken{H8085} not unto the words{H1697} of the prophets{H5030} that prophesy{H5012} unto you: they make you vain{H1891}: they speak{H1696} a vision{H2377} of their own heart{H3820}, and not out of the mouth{H6310} Lordof the {H3068}.

They say{H559} still{H559} unto them that despise{H5006} Lordme, The {H3068} hath said{H1696}, Ye shall have peace{H7965}; and they say{H559} unto every one that walketh{H1980} after the imagination{H8307} of his own heart{H3820}, No evil{H7451} shall come{H935} upon you.imagination: or, stubbornness

For who hath stood{H5975} in the counsel{H5475} Lordof the {H3068}, and hath perceived{H7200} and heard{H8085} his word{H1697}? who hath marked{H7181} his word{H1697}, and heard{H8085} it?counsel: or, secret
Behold, a whirlwind{H5591} Lordof the {H3068} is gone forth{H3318} in fury{H2534}, even a grievous{H2342} whirlwind{H5591}: it shall fall grievously{H2342} upon the head{H7218} of the wicked{H7563}.

The anger{H639} Lordof the {H3068} shall not return{H7725}, until he have executed{H6213}, and till he have performed{H6965} the thoughts{H4209} of his heart{H3820}: in the latter{H319} days{H3117} ye shall consider{H995} it perfectly{H998}.
I have not sent{H7971} these prophets{H5030}, yet they ran{H7323}: I have not spoken{H1696} to them, yet they prophesied{H5012}.

But if they had stood{H5975} in my counsel{H5475}, and had caused my people{H5971} to hear{H8085} my words{H1697}, then they should have turned{H7725} them from their evil{H7451} way{H1870}, and from the evil{H7455} of their doings{H4611}.
Am I a God{H430} at hand{H7138}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}, and not a God{H430} afar off{H7350}?

Can any{H376} hide{H5641} himself in secret places{H4565} that I shall not see{H7200} him? saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}. Do not I fill{H4392} heaven{H8064} and earth{H776}? saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.
I have heard{H8085} what the prophets{H5030} said{H559}, that prophesy{H5012} lies{H8267} in my name{H8034}, saying{H559}, I have dreamed{H2492}, I have dreamed{H2492}.
How long shall this be{H3426} in the heart{H3820} of the prophets{H5030} that prophesy{H5012} lies{H8267}? yea, they are prophets{H5030} of the deceit{H8649} of their own heart{H3820};

Which think{H2803} to cause my people{H5971} to forget{H7911} my name{H8034} by their dreams{H2472} which they tell{H5608} every man{H376} to his neighbour{H7453}, as their fathers{H1} have forgotten{H7911} my name{H8034} for Baal{H1168}.

The prophet{H5030} that hath a dream{H2472}, let him tell{H5608} a dream{H2472}; and he that hath my word{H1697}, let him speak{H1696} my word{H1697} faithfully{H571}. What is the chaff{H8401} to the wheat{H1250}? saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.that hath a dream: Heb. with whom is, etc
Is not my word{H1697} like{H3541} as a fire{H784}? saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}; and like a hammer{H6360} that breaketh{H6327} the rock{H5553} in pieces{H6327}?
Therefore, behold, I am against the prophets{H5030}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}, that steal{H1589} my words{H1697} every one{H376} from his neighbour{H7453}.
Behold, I am against the prophets{H5030}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}, that use{H3947} their tongues{H3956}, and say{H5001}, He saith{H5002}.that…: or, that smooth their tongues

Behold, I am against them that prophesy{H5012} false{H8267} dreams{H2472}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}, and do tell{H5608}them, and cause my people{H5971} to err{H8582} by their lies{H8267}, and by their lightness{H6350}; yet I sent{H7971} them not, nor commanded{H6680} them: therefore they shall not profit{H3276} this people{H5971} at all{H3276}, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

And when this people{H5971}, or the prophet{H5030}, or a priest{H3548}, shall ask{H7592} thee, saying{H559}, What is the burden{H4853} Lordof the {H3068}? thou shalt then say{H559} unto them, What burden{H4853}? I will even forsake{H5203} you, saith{H5002} Lordthe {H3068}.

And as for the prophet{H5030}, and the priest{H3548}, and the people{H5971}, that shall say{H559}, The burden{H4853} Lordof the {H3068}, I will even punish{H6485} that man{H376} and his house{H1004}.punish: Heb. visit upon
Thus shall ye say{H559} every one{H376} to his neighbour{H7453}, and every one{H376} to his brother{H251}, LordWhat hath the {H3068} answered{H6030}? Lordand, What hath the {H3068} spoken{H1696}?

And the burden{H4853} Lordof the {H3068} shall ye mention{H2142} no more: for every man's{H376} word{H1697} shall be his burden{H4853}; for ye have perverted{H2015} the words{H1697} of the living{H2416} God{H430}, Lordof the {H3068} of hosts{H6635} our God{H430}.
Thus shalt thou say{H559} to the prophet{H5030}, LordWhat hath the {H3068} answered{H6030} Lordthee? and, What hath the {H3068} spoken{H1696}?

But{H518} since ye say{H559}, The burden{H4853} Lordof the {H3068}; therefore thus saith{H559} Lordthe {H3068}; Because ye say{H559} this word{H1697}, The burden{H4853} Lordof the {H3068}, and I have sent{H7971} unto you, saying{H559}, Ye shall not say{H559}, The burden{H4853} Lordof the {H3068};

Therefore, behold, I, even I, will utterly{H5377} forget{H5382} you, and I will forsake{H5203} you, and the city{H5892} that I gave{H5414} you and your fathers{H1}, and cast you out of my presence{H6440}:
And I will bring{H5414} an everlasting{H5769} reproach{H2781} upon you, and a perpetual{H5769} shame{H3640}, which shall not be forgotten{H7911}.
